= Redmine Free Mind Plugin

This is a plugin for Redmine

=== Function

1. You can view Free Mind.

=== Plugin installation

1. Copy the plugin directory into the vendor/plugins directory

2. Start Redmine

3. Enable the module on the project setting page.

=== Note

1. This plugin works only Redmine 1.0.0 or higher.

=== Wiki Syntax Quick Reference for user Free Mind Plugin

1. Inline freemind file {{free_mind(attached_freemind_file)}} or {{free_mind(attached_freemind_file, width, hight)}}

=== Special thank!

[makes wiki macro file] Haru Iida
